comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Apparently she was also an ordained minister, and a prison chaplain at Laramie Penitentiary in Wyoming--"the only woman prison chaplain in the world," according to reports at the time: www.dkdonovan.com/getperson.php?personID=I45457&tree=... Here's her gravesite (she's buried with her younger son, who died at age 6): www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Presto...;
